content: What was the rationale for removing the DataElement reosource and what alternatives are there for use in FHIR R4? Is it the equivalent of having the DataElemet as an extension?
I found FHIR#13094 as the point of removal. It mentions StructureDefinition logical models...
Right. A data element is either a stand-alone logical model or a reference to an element in a resource, data type, profile or logical model.
